info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Broadwater and east central Jefferson county445 PM MDT... At 354 PM MDT, radar data confirmed by trained weather spotters showed a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Boulder, moving east at 25 mph. Pea sized hail and brief heavy rain with amounts up to 1 inch were reported in Boulder with this storm. HAZARD...Pea size hail and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible This strong thunderstorm will be near... Townsend around 430 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Elkhorn State Park and Radersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
